client_description_Summary_Note:
Dubois Bertrand Bernard and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Paris. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Dubois Bertrand Bernard is a 22 year old and comes from France.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
client_description_Family_Background: Dubois Bertrand Bernard is currently single.
client_description_Education_Background: Dubois received his secondary school diploma from Lycée Jean-Baptiste Say in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Dubois Bertrand Bernard is a 22 year old and comes from France.
Dubois Bertrand Bernard did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not save any money from his earnings.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, he received an inheritance of 2820000 EUR in 2017, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Dubois navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
